title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8159.01 - Temporary routes around collapsed Thruway bridge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8159.01 - Temporary routes around collapsed Thruway bridge

State Regulations

Pursuant to the designation of access highways in this

Part, and permanent designations previously made by the commissioner in this

Part, special dimension vehicles are temporarily routed around the collapsed
bridge on IR 90 at Fort Hunter, Town of Florida, Montgomery County, along
either of the following routes: Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8159.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
